arguments.argument: file = "lab.cfg" file = ini_open(file) spr = ini_read_string("CFG","sprite",-1) sprite0 = sprite_add(spr,1,0,0,0,0) sprite = sprite_add(spr,1,0,0,sprite_get_width(sprite0)/2,sprite_get_height(sprite0)/2) sprite_delete(sprite0) sprite_index = sprite roomw = ceil(sprite_width/32) roomh = ceil(sprite_height/32) draw = 0
